metas.name: Daniel Tiger's Neighborhood
metas.description: Similar to Bluey and Curious George in its focus on social-emotional learning and gentle exploration of everyday situations.

metas.name: Wild Kratts
metas.description: Educational and adventurous, like Curious George, with a focus on animals and science.

metas.name: The Octonauts
metas.description: Combines adventure, problem-solving, and ocean-themed education, appealing to the same curiosity as Curious George.

metas.name: Arthur
metas.description: A long-running, beloved animated series that tackles relatable childhood issues and friendships, similar to Bluey's themes.

metas.name: Sid the Science Kid
metas.description: Focuses on scientific inquiry and asking questions, a good follow-up for fans of Curious George's inquisitive nature.

metas.name: Peg + Cat
metas.description: Teaches early math concepts through fun, problem-solving adventures, similar in its educational approach to Curious George.

metas.name: Sesame Street
metas.description: A classic educational program that teaches letters, numbers, and social skills, with a playful spirit.

metas.name: Doc McStuffins
metas.description: Encourages empathy and problem-solving as a young girl helps her toys, mirroring the caring aspect seen in Bluey.

metas.name: Super Why!
metas.description: Focuses on literacy skills through interactive storytelling and adventure.

metas.name: T.U.F.F. Puppy
metas.description: Lighthearted animated comedy with animal characters, offering a similar brand of humor to Bluey.

metas.name: Ask the StoryBots
metas.description: Engaging educational show that answers kids' questions about the world in a fun, musical way.

metas.name: The Magic School Bus
metas.description: Classic educational series where students go on wild science adventures, similar to the learning found in Curious George.

metas.name: Puffin Rock
metas.description: Gentle and visually stunning animation about two young puffins exploring their island home, with themes of family and nature.

metas.name: Sarah & Duck
metas.description: A charming and whimsical animated series about a girl and her adopted duck, exploring everyday wonders with a quiet curiosity.

metas.name: Little Bear
metas.description: Sweet and gentle stories about a young bear and his family and friends, with a focus on simple joys and learning.

metas.name: The Lion Guard
metas.description: Action-adventure animated series set in the Lion King universe, with themes of teamwork and responsibility.

metas.name: WordWorld
metas.description: Educational show that teaches reading and spelling by showing how words are built from their letter parts.

metas.name: Go, Diego, Go!
metas.description: Educational adventure series focused on animal rescue and environmentalism, with Spanish language elements.

metas.name: Blippi
metas.description: Live-action series with an energetic host who explores interesting places and teaches children about various topics.

metas.name: Jake and the Never Land Pirates
metas.description: Adventure series with pirate themes, teamwork, and problem-solving, suitable for young children.

metas.name: PAW Patrol
metas.description: Popular animated series about a group of rescue dogs who save the day, emphasizing teamwork and problem-solving.

metas.name: The Cat in the Hat Knows a Lot About That!
metas.description: An animated series based on Dr. Seuss's books, which encourages scientific curiosity and exploration.

metas.name: If You Give a Mouse a Cookie
metas.description: Animated series based on the popular book, exploring cause-and-effect and imaginative scenarios.

metas.name: Rosie's Rules
metas.description: A new series focused on a young girl's experiences as she learns about the world and her Mexican-American heritage.

metas.name: Alma's Way
metas.description: Follows a young Puerto Rican girl as she navigates her community and learns about her culture and family.

metas.name: Xavier Riddle and the Secret Museum
metas.description: An educational adventure series where siblings travel back in time to meet historical figures and learn about their accomplishments.

metas.name: Molly of Denali
metas.description: An animated series following a young Alaska Native girl and her adventures, with a focus on culture and community.

metas.name: Esme & Roy
metas.description: Gentle animated series about two young monster-sitters who help their little monster clients navigate everyday challenges.

metas.name: Shaun the Sheep
metas.description: Stop-motion animated comedy with no dialogue, relying on visual gags and charming characters, similar to the humor in Bluey.

metas.name: Hey Duggee
metas.description: A charming and visually appealing series where Duggee runs a clubhouse for young animals, earning badges for various activities.

metas.name: Tumble Leaf
metas.description: Visually rich stop-motion series with a gentle pace, focusing on exploration, friendship, and discovery for a curious fox named Fig.

metas.name: Pete the Cat
metas.description: Animated series based on the popular book character, encouraging a positive and adventurous outlook on life.

metas.name: Chuggington
metas.description: Animated series about young trains learning about teamwork, friendship, and solving problems in their town.

metas.name: Postman Pat
metas.description: A classic British stop-motion animation about a friendly postman and his adventures in his village.

metas.name: Kipper
metas.description: A gentle and heartwarming animated series about a dog and his friends, focusing on simple everyday adventures and learning.

metas.name: Yo Gabba Gabba!
metas.description: Energetic and educational live-action and animated show that teaches life lessons through music and colorful characters.

metas.name: Peter Rabbit
metas.description: An animated adventure series where Peter and his friends embark on exciting escapades in the English countryside.
